briefTitle: Take-Care Program: Effectiveness of a Physical Therapy Program on Cancer Related Symptoms
officialTitle: TAKE-CARE: EFFECTIVENESS OF A PHYSICAL THERAPY COMBINING CORE STABILITY EXERCISE AND MASSAGE IN CANCER RELATED SYMPTOMS
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Change from Baseline in Fatigue Related Cancer at 6 months
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Finished oncology treatment (chemotherapy, radiation, surgery)

Exclusion Criteria:

* Other musculoskeletal conditions.
